text: aur jis aurat zulekha ke ghar mein yoosuph rahate the usane apane (naajaayaz) matalab haasil karane ke lie khud unase aarazoo kee aur sab daravaaze band kar die aur (be taana) kahane lagee lo aao yoosuph ne kaha maazallaah vah (tumhaare miyaan) mera maalik hain unhonne mujhe achchhee tarah rakha hai mai aisa zulm kyon kar sakata hoon beshak aisa zulm karane vaale phalaah nahin paate
